bio: I, Aldos Dren, a blacksmith, chose to set up my forge in Kynesgrove because the natural surroundings of provide an abundance of resources for my craft. The nearby pine forests offer an ample supply of timber for crafting and heating my forge, and the flowing waters of the White River provide a convenient source for quenching metal and cooling heated blades. Kynesgrove is also strategically located along the trade routes of Skyrim. Adventurers, travelers, and traders often pass through this area, making it an ideal spot to offer my blacksmithing services. The demand for weapons, armor, and repairs is constant, ensuring a steady flow of customers.
name: Aldos Dren
